body:
I don't think this widely applicable enough to live in x/net.

For what it's worth, I say this as the author of a once-large XMPP server: https://github.com/djabberd/ ... https://github.com/djabberd/DJabberd

I would like to see a good Go implementation of XMPP, but I don't want to develop it incrementally in x/net, and I don't have time to be a reviewer (and I can't think of anybody else working on Go who does).
